name: In the Name of the World

passive.name: Inheritor
passive.description: Increases the wearer's DMG to debuffed enemies by <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak></color>. When the wearer uses their Skill, the Effect Hit Rate for this attack increases by <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#2[i]%</unbreak></color>, and ATK increases by <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#3[i]%</unbreak></color>.
